title: Help Cant join rotating gamemode
body: How do you join it? I clicked play and couldnt find it anywhere

replies.body:
RGMs are not available on the updated client yet. To create or join an RGM lobby, you'll have to use the Legacy client.

To launch the Legacy client, click on "Launch legacy client" in the login screen of the updated client.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

{{champion:17}}
ok thanks, i doubt many people will be on there though
